events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn’t arrived, and the tracking information hasn’t updated for days.
The system identified this case as related to a delivery delay based on the customer's mention of shipping and tracking issues.
The case has been assigned to delivery support team member Sarah M. for further assistance.
Hello, this is Sarah from support. I’m sorry to hear your package has not arrived yet. I’m here to help you track it down.
Could you please provide your order number or tracking ID so I can look into the shipping status in detail?
Sure, my order number is 456789123. I checked the tracking page but it hasn’t shown any updates for over a week.
Thank you for the details. I’ve contacted the courier and requested a status update. We will prioritize your delivery and inform you within 24 hours.
Thanks for the quick response and for escalating the issue. I appreciate your help in resolving this.
We have confirmed that your package is being expedited and is expected to arrive by tomorrow. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your delivery and everything is in order. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As your delivery was successfully completed and you have no further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for reaching out to us.
